failure.description: We couldn't process your payment. Don't worry, you haven't been charged.

support.description: If you believe this is an error or if you were charged but still see this message, please contact our support team immediately. We're here to help resolve any billing issues.

privacy.description: Learn how Roundtable protects your data and respects your privacy
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, GDPR, user privacy
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

terms.description: Read the terms and conditions for using Roundtable
terms.keywords: terms of service, user agreement, terms and conditions
terms.title: Terms of Service

signIn.description: Sign in to your Roundtable account to continue AI collaboration
signIn.keywords: sign in, login, AI chat login
signIn.title: Sign In

signUp.description: Create a free Roundtable account and start collaborating with multiple AI models
signUp.keywords: sign up, create account, register, free AI chat
signUp.title: Create Account

changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the effective date.
changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy

children.content: Our service is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
children.title: Children's Privacy

collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us. This includes your email address, usage data, and conversation history.
collection.title: Information We Collect

contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@roundtable.now.
contact.title: Contact Us

cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide, protect, and improve our services. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking

rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also request a copy of your data or opt out of certain data processing activities.
rights.title: Your Rights

security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
security.title: Data Security

sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with service providers who help us operate our platform, subject to confidentiality agreements.
sharing.title: Information Sharing

privacy.tagline: Your privacy and data protection matter to us
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

usage.content: We use collected information to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, communicate with you, and ensure platform security.
usage.title: How We Use Information

acceptance.content: By accessing or using Roundtable, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms

billing.content: Paid subscriptions are billed in advance. You can cancel at any time, and your subscription will remain active until the end of the billing period.
billing.title: Billing and Payments

contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@roundtable.now.
contact.title: Contact Us

governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which Roundtable operates, without regard to conflict of law principles.
governing.title: Governing Law

liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Roundtable shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.
liability.title: Limitation of Liability

privacy.content: Your use of our services is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review it to understand how we collect and use your information.
privacy.title: Privacy

services.content: Roundtable provides AI collaboration tools. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the service at any time.
services.title: Description of Services

terms.tagline: Guidelines for using our AI collaboration platform

termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access immediately, without prior notice, for any breach of these Terms or for any other reason at our discretion.
termination.title: Termination

terms.title: Terms of Service

aeo.primaryAnswer: Roundtable orchestrates multiple AI models to debate, challenge assumptions, and synthesize perspectives. Unlike single-model chats, Roundtable's AIs are context-awareâ€”they build on each other's responses to converge on higher-quality, more reliable outcomes.

relatedQuestions.challengeIdeas: Can AI models challenge my assumptions and play devil's advocate?
